title: A Love-Filled Arrival
afternoon: Meet at the airport, feeling the rush of anticipation... Check-in at The Metro Hotel, a quiet haven in the heart of the city.
evening: An intimate dinner at Nopa, sharing plates, stories, and candlelight. The night deepens at Madrone Art Bar, where music wraps around us like a warm embrace.
lodging: The Metro Hotel, 319 Divisadero Street, 3-star, Check-in 3:00 PM, Check-out Feb 15 before 11:00 AM

title: A Day of Romance in San Francisco
morning: A slow stroll through Panhandle Park, laughter echoing as we capture moments in front of The Painted Ladies.
afternoon: Tea at the Japanese Tea Garden, followed by a dreamy picnic at Shakespeare Garden.
evening: Miniature golf & sundaes at Ghirardelli Square, golden hour at Golden Gate Bridge, and a secret toast at Bourbon & Branch.

title: Jet-Setting Together
afternoon: Champagne and whispered promises in the airport lounge.
evening: A flight to Delhi—stepping into the unknown, together... also, reading Bong Tour for the first time. Life will really never be the same.
transportation: Flight from San Francisco to Delhi

title: Agra Adventure
morning: Train ride aboard the 12050 Gatimaan Express, heading to Agra.
afternoon: Standing before the breathtaking Taj Mahal, followed by an exploration of Agra Fort & Mehtab Bagh.
evening: Check-in at Aman Homestay, a cozy night in the heart of Agra.

title: Jaipur Adventure
morning: A scenic drive to Jaipur, the Pink City, where history and grandeur await.
afternoon: Exploring Hawa Mahal, City Palace, and the grandeur of Albert Hall Museum.
evening: A sunset photoshoot at Jantar Mantar and the breathtaking views from Nahargarh Fort.

title: Jaipur Exploration & Relaxation
morning: Wandering through Johari Bazaar, searching for treasures.
afternoon: Exploring Amer Fort, Panna Meena Ka Kund, and Jaigarh Fort.
evening: A royal dining experience at 1135 AD, a meal fit for kings and queens.

title: A City Awakens
morning: A quiet arrival at Nizza East, where we rest before stepping into the hum of the city.
afternoon: A dreamy walk through Sunder Nursery & the timeless beauty of Humayun’s Tomb.
evening: A sultry night at The Piano Man—music, drinks, and the warmth of the city’s heart.
lodging: Nizza East (Airbnb) morning stay, Ambassador Hotel (Taj) check-in at 2:00 PM

title: Lost in Time
morning: A golden morning in Lodhi Garden, fingers brushing, steps in sync.
afternoon: Lunch at Dos in Lodhi Market, wandering through the charm of Khan Market.
evening: A final walk past India Gate, before visiting Sahil & Vasundra—friends, laughter, home away from home.

title: Arrival in Paradise
morning: A flight to Andamans—an untouched dream waiting to unfold.
afternoon: Check-in at Munjoh Ocean Resort, the sea whispering promises of rest and renewal.
evening: Barefoot walks on the beach, fresh seafood, and a sky bursting with stars.
transportation: Flight to Port Blair, ferry to Havelock Island

title: Love Beneath the Waves
morning: Scuba diving at Nemo Reef, where vibrant corals and gentle waves create a dreamscape beneath the surface.
afternoon: A long walk along Radhanagar Beach, tracing 'forever' into the sand.
evening: A barefoot candlelight dinner on the shore, slow dancing beneath a sky lit by endless stars.

title: Sun-Kissed & Sweet
morning: Water adventures at Elephant Beach, where the sun kisses our skin and the sea whispers secrets.
afternoon: Sunset at Beach No. 5, a lazy afternoon by the shore, holding hands and thinking of nothing but the moment.
evening: Discovering island flavors—tasting Andaman-style egg rolls, exploring quaint village streets.

title: Farewell to Paradise
morning: One last swim in the warm Andaman waters, a quiet breakfast under the palm trees.
afternoon: Flight back from Andamans, with a layover in Kolkata to visit the historic Kalighat Temple.

title: Business & Romance
morning: Syncing up with Co-Dx People, sharing ideas and inspiration.
afternoon: A visit to Qutab Minar, walking in the shadows of history.
evening: Dinner at Qla, a romantic night under Delhi’s starlit sky.

title: The Journey Home
morning: Grabbing breakfast & driving back from Jaipur to Delhi
afternoon: A final stroll through Dilli Haat, picking up last-minute souvenirs and enjoying regional delicacies.
evening: Heading to Indira Gandhi International Airport, reminiscing about an unforgettable trip.
night: Boarding the flight home, carrying memories of Delhi’s vibrant culture and rich history.
lodging: In transit – overnight flight... re-working bong tour, ready to dream of the next adventure.
transportation: Local transport in Delhi to the airport, followed by an international flight home.
